column4: I know with linux to linux I can run ssh -Y blahblah to run remote x windows session, any easy way to do this from a windows host?
or to clarify, I'm on a iwndows machine, ssh'ing to an Ubuntu server, looking to do remote x-windows session so it shows up on the windwos machine
not sure... I dont have a windows machine left to test on... you might also look at teamviewer
